body_html:
@samikama Understood. For python 3 I got the following problem now:

2018-02-08 22:35:58.512579: I tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/convert/convert_nodes.cc:1590] OK finished op building
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/test/test_tftrt.py", line 67, in <module>
    inpDims[0])  # Get optimized graph
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/trt_convert.py", line 72, in CreateInferenceGraph
    output_graph_def_string = to_bytes(out[1])
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/trt_convert.py", line 49, in py3bytes
    return inp.encode('utf-8', errors='surrogateescape')
AttributeError: 'bytes' object has no attribute 'encode'

For python 2 when I tried to import tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt it says libnvinfer not found, like:

>>> import tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/__init__.py", line 19, in <module>
    from tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt.python import *
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/__init__.py", line 6, in <module>
    from tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt.python.ops import trt_engine_op
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/ops/trt_engine_op.py", line 31, in <module>
    resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile("_trt_engine_op.so"))
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/util/loader.py", line 55, in load_op_library
    ret = load_library.load_op_library(path)
  File ".../tensorflow/python/framework/load_library.py", line 58, in load_op_library
    lib_handle = py_tf.TF_LoadLibrary(library_filename, status)
  File ".../tensorflow/python/framework/errors_impl.py", line 516, in __exit__
    c_api.TF_GetCode(self.status.status))
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.NotFoundError: libnvinfer.so.4: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

body:
@samikama Understood. For python 3 I got the following problem now:
```
2018-02-08 22:35:58.512579: I tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/convert/convert_nodes.cc:1590] OK finished op building
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/test/test_tftrt.py", line 67, in <module>
    inpDims[0])  # Get optimized graph
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/trt_convert.py", line 72, in CreateInferenceGraph
    output_graph_def_string = to_bytes(out[1])
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/trt_convert.py", line 49, in py3bytes
    return inp.encode('utf-8', errors='surrogateescape')
AttributeError: 'bytes' object has no attribute 'encode'
```
For python 2 when I tried to `import tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt` it says libnvinfer not found, like:
```
>>> import tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/__init__.py", line 19, in <module>
    from tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt.python import *
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/__init__.py", line 6, in <module>
    from tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt.python.ops import trt_engine_op
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/python/ops/trt_engine_op.py", line 31, in <module>
    resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile("_trt_engine_op.so"))
  File ".../tensorflow/contrib/util/loader.py", line 55, in load_op_library
    ret = load_library.load_op_library(path)
  File ".../tensorflow/python/framework/load_library.py", line 58, in load_op_library
    lib_handle = py_tf.TF_LoadLibrary(library_filename, status)
  File ".../tensorflow/python/framework/errors_impl.py", line 516, in __exit__
    c_api.TF_GetCode(self.status.status))
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.NotFoundError: libnvinfer.so.4: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```
